review: amazing film totally wonderful with great message on our education system in private colleges and crimes happens there . there were lacks during first half and second half as first half was average and second half was really good . so in my opinion this movie can be rated as 4 out 5 stars . vijay sir was great and keerthy suresh was also good all in all a good to watch . and vijay and suriya sir both are the pride of tamil cinema .and both of them are great in action , romance, comedy  and acting no one can match there pace , stamina ,speed and accuracy . and this was a little kind of hari sir s film format who usually showcase this hero villian combat proper eye contact and amazing to watch vijay sir on big screen he and suriya sir mostly they do message oriented and family oriented films good to watch both of them they are great .

the movie is really thrilling,stylish and kick ass. vijay just blows out your mind with his stunning looks and style. jagapati babu shines as an strong villain. bgm of the movie was also good. screenplay in first half could have been better but 2nd half is a treat to vijay fans. ratings:7.5/10.
